newsitem.title: MEXICO: MEXICO CATTLE REPORT, FEEDER EXPORT PRICE - USDA.
newsitem.headline: MEXICO CATTLE REPORT, FEEDER EXPORT PRICE - USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Wednesday that around 300 head were exported into the United States at two crossing points Tuesday.
Through Laredo, Texas, around 100 head were sold and via Eagle Pass, Texas, another 200 were exported. USDA said that at both points volume was not sufficient to establish trend or quote prices.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom +525 7289530)) E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com
